system.description:
Benefit

When the character wears medium armor, they can add the armor’s equipment bonus to their DEF, and the armor’s skill penalty only applies to the following skills: Acrobatics, Athletics, and Stealth.

Normal

A character who wears armor with which they are not proficient only receives the Damage Reduction bonus, and suffers the armor’s skill penalty on the listed skill checks.

Tutoring

Time: 1 day

Benefit: Can gain up to +2 to Defense when wearing medium armor
